texts.Features:TencentSmsEnable.Desc: Enabled to support Tencent cloud SMS capabilities.
texts.Features:TencentBlobStoringEnable.Desc: Enable to support Tencent cloud object storage capability.
texts.Features:TencentBlobStoringMaximumStream: Size(MB) limit for a single uploaded file stream,0 or less.
texts.Description:EndPoint: Represents a region where a resource resides, and each region contains one or more available regions.
texts.Description:SecretId: The Secret Id can be obtained only from Tencent Cloud Management Console.
texts.Description:SecretKey: The Secret Key can be obtained only from Tencent Cloud Management Console.
texts.Description:HttpMethod: The SDK uses the POST method by default, but if you must use the GET method, you can set it here. The GET method cannot handle some large requests.
texts.Description:WebProxy: Proxy server, set when there are proxy servers in your environment.
texts.Description:AppId: AppId applied on Tencent Cloud SMS control platform.
texts.Description:DefaultSignName: Default signname if no signname is specified in the SMS message body
texts.Description:DefaultTemplateId: Default template id if the Template Id number is not specified in the SMS message body.
